data.name: BasicSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up the basic settings for this page.

data.name: TabNameHelp.Text
data.value: This is the name of the Page. The text you enter will be displayed in the menu system.

data.name: TitleHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a title for the Page here. The text you enter will be displayed in the browser window title.

data.name: DescriptionHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a description about this page here.

data.name: ParentTabHelp.Text
data.value: Select the page that you would like this page to be a child of.

data.name: TemplateHelp.Text
data.value: Select a page template which you would like to use to create this page.

data.name: UrlHelp.Text
data.value: If you would like this page to behave as a navigation link to another resource, you can specify the Link URL value here. Please note that this field is optional.

data.name: CopyModulesHelp.Text
data.value: Select the page (if any) that you would like to copy modules from.

data.name: CopyContentHelp.Text
data.value: Select the modules that you wish to copy and enter the title for the module. In addition specify if you want to create a New module ( without content ), a Copy of the module ( with content ), or a Reference to an existing module ( shared content ).

data.name: AdvancedSettingsHelp.Text
data.value: In this section, you can set up more advanced settings for this page.

data.name: IconHelp.Text
data.value: You can choose an icon that can be used in the menu.

data.name: TabSkinHelp.Text
data.value: The selected skin will be applied to this page.

data.name: TabContainerHelp.Text
data.value: The selected container will be applied to all modules on this page.

data.name: HiddenHelp.Text
data.value: If the page is hidden it does not show up on the menu. However you can still link to it based on its page URL.

data.name: DisabledHelp.Text
data.value: If the page is disabled it is not available to users of the site. You can use this option to suppress content that you might wish to show at a later time.

data.name: PermissionsHelp.Text
data.value: Choose the groups of people that can view and administer this page.

data.name: KeyWordsHelp.Text
data.value: Enter some keywords for this page (separated by commas). These keywords are used by search engines to help index your site's pages.

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the start date for displaying this page. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: plEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the end date for displaying this page. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: DeleteSpecialPage.Text
data.value: A page defined as Home, Splash, Login or User Page for the portal, or the last visible Page in the portal cannot be deleted.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Page Management

This module allows you to modify the settings for an existing page, delete the page, or submit it to Google for indexing.

data.name: RefreshInterval.Help
data.value: Enter the interval to wait between automatic page refeshes. (Example: Enter "60" for 1 minute or leave blank to disable.)

data.name: PageHeadText.Help
data.value: Enter any tags (i.e. META tags) that should be rendered in the "HEAD" tag of the HTML for this page.
